org.trianacode.gui.action.tools

Class RunScriptAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • org.trianacode.gui.action.tools.RunScriptAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action, ActionDisplayOptions

    public class RunScriptAction
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction
implements ActionDisplayOptions
    Action class to handle running Triana scripts.
